gov.nih.nlm.ling.graph

Class GraphUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.graph.GraphUtils

  • public class GraphUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains generic static utility methods for graphs created with JGraph.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

                                           java.util.Set<V> descendants)
        Finds all descendants of a node in the graph.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the generic node type
        E - the generic edge type
        Parameters:
        graph - a graph
        node - a node in the graph
        descendants - the set of all nodes descending from node

      • getAllDescendants

        public static <V,E> void getAllDescendants(org.jgrapht.DirectedGraph<V,E> graph,
                                           java.util.List<V> nodes,
                                           java.util.Set<V> descendants)
        Same as #getAllDescendants(DirectedGraph, Object), except it considers a list of nodes as input.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the generic node type
        E - the generic edge type
        Parameters:
        graph - a graph
        nodes - a list of nodes
        descendants - all descendants of the nodes in the graph

      • getSuccessors

        public static <V,E> java.util.Set<V> getSuccessors(org.jgrapht.DirectedGraph<V,E> graph,
                                                   V node)
        Finds all successors of a node in the graph. Successors are all nodes with an incoming edge from the given node.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the generic node type
        E - the generic edge type
        Parameters:
        graph - a graph
        node - a node in the graph
        Returns:
        a set of all successors

      • getPrecedessors

        public static <V,E> java.util.Set<V> getPrecedessors(org.jgrapht.DirectedGraph<V,E> graph,
                                                     V node)
        Finds all predecessors of a node in the graph. Precedessors are all nodes with an outgoing edge to the given node.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the generic node type
        E - the generic edge type
        Parameters:
        graph - a graph
        node - a node in the graph
        Returns:
        a set of all predecessors
